ai-patthana15.6:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.6:1.1_0: For it does not arise because of applied and sustained thought ...
ai-patthana15.6:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.6:2.1_0: For it does not arise because of applied and sustained thought, without placing the mind, and keeping it connected there are no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.6:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.6:3.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. You shouldn’t give rise to the placing of the mind and keeping it connected. You shouldn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.6:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
